title: Functionalized 2D membranes for separations at the 1-nm scale
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4CS00272E, Review Article
Yuan Kang, Yuqi Wang, Hao Zhang, Zhouyou Wang, Xiwang Zhang, Huanting Wang
Functionalization strategies, intermolecular forces, enhanced membrane performance, and future directions in two-dimensional-based membrane design are reviewed for diverse separation applications.
